name: Product UX Designer Skills Assessment
description:
Assess your UX design skills and figure out what you want to focus your energy on with your learning and development. Can be used by managers and designers. Update quarterly and keep track of your progress in Figma.


Feel free to borrow these competencies and skills or mix it up and create your own.


You can use Reflect 1:1's or Quarterly Check-in's as a prompt to update this as well.
